com.undead_pixels.dungeon_bots.scene

Interface BatchRenderable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Actor, Entity, Player, RpgActor, SpriteEntity, Tile

    public interface BatchRenderable
    Something with both render(SpriteBatch) and update(dt) functions. Basically anything that's renderable but should be batched with other similar things.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getZ() 
      void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Renders this Renderable.
      void update(float dt)
      Updates this Renderable.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(float dt)
        Updates this Renderable. Called at some point before render().
        Parameters:
        dt - delta time

      • render

        void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Renders this Renderable. All rendering should be performed in tile-space, and a camera transform will automagically turn things into screen-space
        Parameters:
        batch - The batch to insert this renderable into

      • getZ

        float getZ()
        Returns:
        the requested z (layer) value
